Reviews.Title: Great camera!!!!
Reviews.Author: Luis Chapeta
Reviews.Content: My first camera was fujifilm and I always liked. This camera had a great color and sharp images. Great functions and friendly menu. I higly recomend this item.

ProductInfo.Features:
14.2 megapixel resolution - Delivers excellent picture quality
Fujinon 5-25mm zoom lens - Offers f/3.9 to f/4.9 aperture and features a 5x optical zoom
3.0" touchscreen LCD display - Enjoy easy focus selection and photo viewing
HD movies - Record movies in 720p HD format on this compact camera
12 scene modes - Provide creative options for taking eye-catching photos with accurate color
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm Finepix Z85 14 Mp Digital Camera with Fujinon 5x Wide Angle Optical Zoom Lens and 3-inch Touch-screen LCD (Blue Bundle)
